FuncDef:
The igmp snooping querier enable command enables a querier in a VLAN.
The undo igmp snooping querier enable command disables a querier in a VLAN. The igmp snooping querier enable command enables a querier in a VLAN. The undo igmp snooping querier enable command disables a querier in a VLAN. By default, queriers are disabled in all VLANs.
ExtraInfo:
After the querier function is enabled on a Layer 2 device, this device will replace its upstream device to send IGMP Query messages, and will be able to create and maintain multicast forwarding entries at the data link layer, implementing multicast data forwarding.
The following conditions must be met before the igmp-snooping querier enable command is run:
